name: Capture Me On
body: Goal: Send JSON to logs that: - give a list of information based on options - any event - Pass in all data- elements -- Include ignore data elements, for example bind **Requires:** jquery h2. Example usage: $('a').captureMeOn('click', options); default options: ``` { "engine": null, //either null or a function. Null defaults to console "exclude":["bind"], //exclude all things using data-*, based on list. data-bind is popular amongst knockout "alwaysInclude":[], //key/value list of objects to always include. If it needs to run at runtime, wrap in a function "includeHref": true } ``` Given defaults, the output for html: ``` Click Here ``` is: ``` { "href":"Test/Test1.html", "userId":"12345", "datetime":1456595819081 } ```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
